name: Droneployee Of The Month
description: You are a drone with one  simple assignment: follow orders and deliver goods across the factory floor. This would be an easy task if the person controlling you wasn’t sleeping on the job, but alas – you need to take matters into your own hands. But the world is dangerous for a little drone like you - do you have what it takes to get the job done and earn Droneployee Of The Month?
